definitions.definition: (of an atmosphere or event) friendly, lively, and enjoyable.
(of a person) cheerful and friendly; jovial.
examples: friendly, genial, affable, amiable, congenial, agreeable, good-humored, cordial, warm, sociable, outgoing, gregarious, companionable, clubby, hail-fellow-well-met, cheerful, jolly, jovial, lively; Moreenjoyable, festive "our convivial host"Moreenjoyable, festive our convivial host
